author: By Michael Kruse
title: The New Trump Show: ‘I’ve Gotten to Like This Room’
description: The president has turned the abandoned briefing room into a new stage and he’s making it must-see TV.
content: When pressed for nettlesome particulars, he has stepped aside for Pence, for Birx, for immunologist and task force member Tony Fauci and othersresolutely, practically reflexively shifting the blame. To his predecessors (we inherited a very obsolete system). T… [+3291 chars]
